fields.name: inner_inset_position
fields.label: Inset position
fields.tooltip: Specify the inset column position in the layout.

fields.name: right_banner_width
fields.label: Right banner width
fields.tooltip: Specify the width of the right banner area (if both banners are used)

fields.name: sidebar_left_width
fields.label: Sidebar Left Width
fields.tooltip: Specify the width of the theme sidebar as a percentage

fields.name: sidebar_right_width
fields.label: Sidebar Right Width
fields.tooltip: Specify the width of the theme inset column as a percentage

fields.name: inset_width
fields.label: Inset Width
fields.tooltip: Specify the width of the theme article inset column as a percentage

fields.name: template_width
fields.label: Theme Width
fields.tooltip: Specify the maximum base width for the theme to be visible on desktop computers.

fields.name: tablet_width
fields.label: Tablet Width
fields.tooltip: Specify the browser width when tablet.css is loaded. We recommend 800 pixels.

fields.name: small_tablet_width
fields.label: Small Tablet Width
fields.tooltip: Specify the browser width when tablet.small.css is loaded. We recommend 820 pixels.

fields.name: mobile_width
fields.label: Mobile Width
fields.tooltip: Specify the browser width when mobile.css is loaded. We recommend 480 pixels

fields.name: head_code
fields.label: Code for the HEAD section
fields.tooltip: You can specify the code which will be added at the end of the HEAD section - it is useful when you need to add some additional metatags, scripts etc.

fields.name: footer_code
fields.label: Code for the footer section
fields.tooltip: You can specify the code which will be added before closing body tag - it is useful when you need to add some additional scripts, trackers etc.

fields.name: frontpage_explained
fields.label: Settings connected with the frontpage layout

fields.name: override_frontpage
fields.label: Override frontpage layout
fields.tooltip: Enable settings connected with another layout for the homepage.

fields.name: frontpage_sidebar_left_width
fields.label: Sidebar Left Width
fields.tooltip: Specify the width of the theme sidebar as a percentage (for the homepage)

fields.name: frontpage_sidebar_right_width
fields.label: Sidebar Right Width
fields.tooltip: Specify the width of the theme homepage inset column as a percentage
